Description: Fragment of base of Attic black-glazed pottery stamped bolsal. Foot mostly lost. Glazed inside and outside; underside reserved with band and ring at the edge and dot, circle and band at the centre. On floor, frieze of stamped, linked palmettes between bands of tongues. Incised inscription on underside..
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1864)
